html:
beast of the field/jackals/owls. The wild beasts and desert creatures probably represent the nations that have not been "tamed" by the gospel and that thirst for the living water. They will yet come to that water (the gospel) and will therefore have cause to honor the Lord.

waters in the wilderness/rivers in the desert. These waters are provided to God's people for drink. They are the waters that bring spiritual life (41:18; 35:1, 7; 51:3).

my people, my chosen. The covenant children of Israel (43:1, 5-7) not only anciently but in our own day.
